FuncDef: This command allows the use of BGP route tunnels available in the tunnel table to reach SDP far-end nodes. Use of BGP route tunnels are only available with MPLS-SDP. Only one of the transport methods is allowed per SDP - LDP, RSVP-LSP BGP, SR-ISIS, or SR-OSPF. This restriction is relaxed for some combinations of the transport methods when the mixed-lsp-mode option is enabled within the SDP.
ExtraInfo: Default: no bgp-tunnel (BGP tunnel route to SDP far-end is disabled)
